intents.user_motivation: seeking foundational knowledge about insurance to make informed decisions

intents.sub_intent: what not to say to an insurance adjuster
intents.user_motivation: avoiding common mistakes during insurance claims to maximize benefits
intents.search_context: users are likely in the claims process or preparing for it and want to avoid pitfalls
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: offer trust-building advice through ING's customer-centric approach

intents.sub_intent: how to get the most out of an insurance claim
intents.user_motivation: maximizing claim payouts and ensuring a smooth claims process
intents.search_context: users are actively filing claims or planning to file and need actionable tips
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: highlight ING's digital tools for efficient claims management

intents.sub_intent: how to avoid paying high auto insurance
intents.user_motivation: reducing insurance costs while maintaining adequate coverage
intents.search_context: users are cost-conscious and exploring ways to save on auto insurance
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: showcase ING's competitive pricing and personalized insurance solutions
